title: Tin - leading companies worldwide based on production output 2017
yAxis: Production output in thousand metric tons
summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Largest Tin Producers, and Production output in thousand metric tons in each Largest Tin Producers on the y axis.
Largest Tin Producers Yunnan Tin (China) has the highest Production output in thousand metric tons and Gejiu Zi-Li (China) has the lowest Production output in thousand metric tons.
The maximum Largest Tin Producers Yunnan Tin (China) has got 8.56 times higher Production output in thousand metric tons than the minimum Largest Tin Producers Gejiu Zi-Li (China).
min_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Largest Tin Producers, and Production output in thousand metric tons in each Largest Tin Producers on the y axis.
The maximum Production output in thousand metric tons 74.5 is found at Largest Tin Producers Yunnan Tin (China) and the minimum is found at Gejiu Zi-Li (China) where Largest Tin Producers is 8.7.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Largest Tin Producers, and Production output in thousand metric tons in each Largest Tin Producers on the y axis.
Largest Tin Producers Yunnan Tin (China) has the highest Production output in thousand metric tons and Gejiu Zi-Li (China) has the lowest Production output in thousand metric tons.
The maximum Largest Tin Producers Yunnan Tin (China) has got 8.56 times higher Production output in thousand metric tons than the minimum Largest Tin Producers Gejiu Zi-Li (China).
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Production output in thousand metric tons for 10 number of Largest Tin Producerss.
The maximum Production output in thousand metric tons 74.5 is found at Largest Tin Producers Yunnan Tin (China) and the minimum is found at Gejiu Zi-Li (China) where Largest Tin Producers is 8.7.
Second maximum Production output in thousand metric tons is found at Largest Tin Producers PT Timah (Indonesia).
The minimum Largest Tin Producers Gejiu Zi-Li (China) has got 8.56 times less Production output in thousand metric tons than the maximum Largest Tin Producers Yunnan Tin (China).

Largest Tin Producers Yunnan Tin (China) is higher than any other Largest Tin Producerss with value 74.5, followed by PT Timah (Indonesia), and Malaysia Smelting Corporation (Malaysia). Down to Largest Tin Producers Gejiu Zi-Li (China) with the lowest value 8.7.
The lowest value 8.7 at Gejiu Zi-Li (China) is almost 3.24 times smaller than the average value 22.98.
